summary: THE FRONT STABILIZER BAR BOLT KEEPING BREAKING OFF.  IN SEPARATE OCCURRENCES THE BOLTS HAVE FALLEN OFF OR BROKEN OFF ON THE RIGHT AND LEFT SIDE.  DON'T KNOW IF THE WEIGHT OF THE FRONT END IS TO MUCH FOR THE VEHICLE.  THE EXPEDITION HAS BEEN DRIVER, JUST AN INCONVENIENCE AND A CONCERN.  *NLM
